titles.title: A bill to redesignate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 162 Northeast Avenue in Tallmadge, Ohio, as the "Lance Corporal Daniel Nathan Deyarmin, Jr., Post Office Building".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 5/12/2014--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 162 Northeast Avenue in Tallmadge, Ohio, as the "Lance Corporal Daniel Nathan Deyarmin, Jr., Post Office Building."
